short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your browsing experience with font, theme, and color options for enhanced accessibility.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhanced Accessibility Extension is a powerful tool that improves web accessibility for users with diverse needs. With this extension, you can customize your browsing experience with features like font size adjustment, black and white theme, color inversion, underlined links, font regularity and scroll to top feature. Make web content easier to read and navigate, ensuring a comfortable browsing experience for everyone.
